casename: Velstra Pte Ltd (in liquidation) v Dexia Bank Belgium
counsel: Vinodh Coomaraswamy and David Chan (Shook Lin & Bok) for the plaintiff; Tan Chuan Thye and Ivan Chia (Allen & Gledhill) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Stay of proceedings/Plaintiffs bringing action to void transaction entered into with defendants/Defendants facing criminal proceedings involving same transaction in foreign forum/Defendants seeking stay of civil proceedings in Singapore/Whether defendants have shown real danger of prejudice to justify granting stay
